snippet.title: A Sister's Journey - 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore a charmingly beautiful, hand-crafted pixel art world and help Violet on her journey searching for her sister. Uncover its mysteries, face its threatening foes, and run 'n gun your way through this challenging action-metroidvania - which will put your true platforming skills to the test.

Wishlist A Sister's Journey on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1730790?utm_source=youtube

You can also follow the game's development on Twitter : https://twitter.com/asistersjourney
